title: Just gonna point this out about the Aatrox Rework
body:
He's become what you aimed to fix with this rework Riot: A balancing nightmare. And here we are, giving him the very gutting that happened with the two previous renditions of Aatrox because he became too good at his job, leading to being slowly but surely forgotten in the realm of soloqueue.

If you want one crucial thing to be pinpointed on why this rework has become a nightmare, here it is: You put too much emphasis on his Q to the point his Q is all he is, nothing more and nothing less. Its clear the rework has failed to do what it was set out to do.
At this point, you might as well throw out a semi revert and experiment with the old kit on the PBE for a better fix. I want to make sure Aatrox avoids a Kalista/Azir/Ryze situation where he basically gets left in the dirt because of pro play. I loved this champ in his previous form and stuck it up with this version, and the last thing I need is losing another champ I love playing in norms and ranked (Already lost Maokai).

I just want to hear from a rioter on the balance team if they might consider a semi revert as an option, and make sure they will avoid putting him, Akali, and Irelia on the track of being the next Kalista/Azir/Ryze. No person should have their main ruined and torn like those 3 have.
